title: Care+Protect 3 in 1 Washing Machine - Dishwasher Cleaner - Limescale Remover - Degreaser - Hygienic Cleaner - Universal - 24 Months Supply - Maxi Pack
features: A SINGLE SOLUTION: CARE + PROTECT 3 IN 1 effectively combines descaling, degreasing and sanitizing products for washing machines and dishwashers in a single product
TOTAL PROTECTION: Descaler for washing machines and dishwashers to protect your appliances against formation of limescale, dirt residues and bad smells
CONTINUOUS MAINTENANCE: Descaling treatment for the care and maintenance of your washing machine and dishwasher. Eliminates limescale from pipes, filters and the inside of the machine
EXTEND THE LIFE OF YOUR APPLIANCE: removes limescale deposits, thoroughly cleans and eliminates mould and unpleasant odours, extending the life of the appliance and optimising consumption
LONG-LASTING: Maxi pack of 12 Powder sachets *2 for 24 months of Protection
description: Product Description Keep your washing machine and dishwasher clean and performing well with 3 IN 1 from CARE + PROTECT. This descaling, degreasing and sanitizing treatment improves the care and maintenance of your appliances, extending their lifespan. Removes limescale deposits from filters, pipes and the interior of your washing machine and dishwasher. In addition, its sanitizing and degreasing action thoroughly eliminates excess grease and detergent that can cause unpleasant odours. In the washing machine: pour the contents of a sachet directly into the drum and run an empty cycle (without laundry) at maximum temperature, without pre-washing. In the dishwasher: pour half of the sachet into the bottom of the dishwasher and the other half into the detergent dispenser, and then run an empty cycle (without dishes) at maximum temperature, without pre-washing. Maxi Pack of 24 months of protection. Using just one sachet of descaling powder per month will help extend the life of your appliance and prevent breakdowns and malfunctions. Ingredients Care + Protect 3 IN 1 Limescale Remover-Effectively Combines Descaling, Degreasing And Sanitising Directions Place half of the bag on the bottom of the tub and half into the dishwasher, and then perform an idle (without dishes) without preheating without preheating. For washing machine: put the contents of a bag directly into the drum and perform an idle (without washing) at maximum temperature without pre-washing. See more
